${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:BloodMoney.NAME: Blood Money
${modID}:BloodMoney.FLAVOR: The disease of Midas flows through your veins.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, gain an equivalent amount of money.

${modID}:CombatManual.NAME: Combat Manual
${modID}:CombatManual.FLAVOR: Understanding yourself is the first step in understanding the battlefield.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup choose a #ypower. Gain its effect at the beginning of combat.
